name: Path M
title: Pathological M
notes: **Note:** Involvement of inguinal, pelvic, or external iliac lymph nodes with previous scrotal or inguinal surgery prior to presentation of the testis tumor is coded in regional lymph nodes and not in distant metastasis.
rows:
Note: M1 has subcategories of M1a and M1b. Assign M1 only when there is no information available to assign one of the subcategories

Distant metastasis, NOS

Stated as M1 [NOS]
Non-regional lymph node(s) or lung metastasis

Distant lymph node(s):  
    External iliac 
    Inguinal nodes, NOS:
        Deep, NOS
        Node of Cloquet or Rosenmuller (highest deep inguinal)
        Superficial (femoral)    
     Pelvic, NOS
WITHOUT previous scrotal or inguinal surgery OR UNKNOWN if previous
scrotal or inguinal surgery

Distant lymph node(s), NOS

Distant metastasis to lung

Stated as M1a
Distant metastasis other than non-regional lymph nodes and lung

Carcinomatosis

Distant metastasis to other distant sites WITH or WITHOUT metastasis to lung
 and/or distant lymph node(s)

Stated as M1b
